activities: We use the personal information you provide to us when you sign-up for an event to process your registration at such events. We also use information you provide to us to send you specific information that you request. We use the information automatically collected by our servers to monitor and analyze how users use the Site and to maintain and improve the Site.  We may use your e-mail address to (i) send you newsletters that keep you updated about CoreObjects, (ii) respond to or confirm your requests or activity on the Site, and (iii) to determine your interest in our services. If you provide us your telephone number, we may use your telephone number to follow-up and determine your interest in our services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: If we are unable to resolve the issue to the satisfaction of the individual involved, we agree to mediate the issue through either the Judician Arbitration and Mediation Service (JAMS) or the American Arbitration Association (AAA).
